divs: sighting detailsit was a clear night temp was around 56 no aircraft were in the area of the mountain ta the time i was sitting on the front porch with my wife when we saw a flash ing over at the mountain red in color we watched as in would flash on and off then to the left we saw five brite rede objctes lite up in a row at the crest of the mountain an stayed lit for about 3 minutes then when out then ther were flashes of other object all around the mountain crest then ther were aircraft that took off from the near by airforce base that headed toward the mountain three in all they flew around as if looking for something. i would like to know if anyone else saw what we did \ please let me know thank you.
